body:
Sakura is the most popular female character, so he mainly draws her. He's also drawn Hinata, Tsunade, Shizune, Ino and Sarada (ew) from time to time. Nowhere near as often as Sakura, but it's the most we can expect and it's silly to expect his status quo to change at this point.

Maybe he can draw Boruto fucking MILF Sakura sometime, though.

NGL recently I feel like his art got worse.  The past 3 or so doujins seem to be less polished than the old ones imo. I also agree that he should add more naruto girls I got tired of Sakura every single time tho it's better than Sarada that's for sure

half agree with the guy below me. stick to naruto but enough with sakura. fuck ino more or hinata or any other really hot girl in naruto. way too much sakura though. got anko temari tsunade hinata kuranai and the list goes on and on but for some reasons hes so focused on sakura. shes hot but nowhere near the hottest. imo thats ino then tsunade then anko then sakura. but at this point sakura is dull.

Another doujin of Naruto fucking slutty Sakura with literally nothing to set it apart from the rest, oh but now with some Dragon Quest for no reason.

Dude should stick to drawing Naruto; just come up with something  more original than "Naruto fucks Sakura again". He can still draw Naruto fucking her; he doesn't even have to add in any other girls if he doesn't want to. But he should just come up with a more original premise; Shippuden is old news now, so he should draw more Boruto doujins.
sahara wataru work never disappoint my pen
Maam's part was messier than Sakura, though I guess that's a given since this artist LOVES Sakura. Still, I really like it overall, hoping to see more Maam from him.
